html:
Diary, Filter: Type Design

  1. Announcement: Silber & Blei Silber und Blei is the alloy of Anne and me for the manufacturing of valuable books. I introduce our undertaking here for the first time and show you the logo that I designed for attunement.
    Permalink Thursday, June 6, 2013 8:24:39 PM Europe/Berlin
    Filters:
    • News
    • Type Design
    • Graphic Design
  2. The @inpressulum font and a typographic tattoo When Marc told me of his planned tattoo, he did not know which font to use. An unbearable state. I designed the gaelic font and the tattoo.
    Permalink Sunday, September 2, 2012 9:04:49 PM Europe/Berlin
    Filters:
    • Type Design
    • Graphic Design
  3. graphicore Bitmap Font Building—updated This is the release of the typeface “graphicore Bitmap Font” and the script that built it: “graphicore Bitmap Font Building”—both as Free and Open Source Software under the SIL Open Font License (OFL) and GNU Affero General Public License (AGPL).
    Permalink Wednesday, September 15, 2010 6:58:24 PM Europe/Berlin
    Filters:
    • News
    • Web and Code
    • Type Design
